languages.text: "Или было бы лучше, если бы на Футфоле по-прежнему царил Владайм? Наместник давно запятнал себя, якшаясь с врагами Человечества и их творениями, а сейчас он лишь усугубил скверну в своей душе. Добровольно привести ксеносов во владения Императора ради пособничества в мятеже против Его слуг? Ересь!"

traits.locale_text: "Наместник давно запятнал себя, якшаясь с врагами Человечества и их творениями, а сейчас он лишь усугубил скверну в своей душе. Добровольно привести ксеносов во владения Императора ради пособничества в мятеже против Его слуг? Ересь! Быть может, если он покается, сложит оружие и предстанет перед судом, его душу еще можно будет спасти".
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Or would it have been better for Footfall to still be ruled by Vladaym? The Liege tainted his name long ago by mingling with enemies of Humanity and dabbling in their creations. Now he has but deepened the corruption in his soul. Wilfully bringing xenos into the Emperor's domain to assist an insurgency against His servants? Heresy!"
languages.original_text: "Или было бы лучше, если бы на Футфоле по-прежнему царил Владайм? Наместник давно запятнал себя, якшаясь с врагами Человечества и их творениями, а сейчас он лишь усугубил скверну в своей душе. Добровольно привести ксеносов во владения Императора ради пособничества в мятеже против Его слуг? Ересь!"

traits.locale_text: "Or would it have been better for Footfall to still be ruled by Vladaym? The Liege tainted his name long ago by mingling with enemies of Humanity and dabbling in their creations. Now he has but deepened the corruption in his soul. Wilfully bringing xenos into the Emperor's domain to assist an insurgency against His servants? Heresy!"

Now he has but deepened the corruption in his soul. Wilfully bringing xenos into the Emperor's domain to assist an insurgency against His servants? Heresy!"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: “还是说，你觉得由弗拉迪姆来统治落脚港更好？这位总督很久以前，就和人类之敌勾结在一起，滥用他们的亵渎之物，玷污了他的名声。而现在，他的灵魂变得更加堕落了。他竟然将异形肆意带到帝皇的领地，协助叛乱分子对抗帝皇的仆人？简直是异端恶行！”
languages.original_text: "Or would it have been better for Footfall to still be ruled by Vladaym? The Liege tainted his name long ago by mingling with enemies of Humanity and dabbling in their creations. Now he has but deepened the corruption in his soul. Wilfully bringing xenos into the Emperor's domain to assist an insurgency against His servants? Heresy!"

traits.locale_text: “还是说，你觉得由弗拉迪姆来统治落脚港更好？这位总督很久以前，就和人类之敌勾结在一起，滥用他们的亵渎之物，玷污了他的名声。而现在，他的灵魂变得更加堕落了。他竟然将异形肆意带到帝皇的领地，协助叛乱分子对抗帝皇的仆人？简直是异端恶行！”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: 「それとも、ヴラダイムに引き続き支配されている方が、フットフォールにとっては良かったとでも言うのか？あいつは人類の敵と交わり、彼らの創造物に手を出した。結果、彼の名誉は汚された。今は魂の腐敗が、更に進んでいる。異種族を皇帝の領地に連れ込み、皇帝の召使に対する反乱に参加させている。異端なんだよ！」
languages.original_text: "Or would it have been better for Footfall to still be ruled by Vladaym? The Liege tainted his name long ago by mingling with enemies of Humanity and dabbling in their creations. Now he has but deepened the corruption in his soul. Wilfully bringing xenos into the Emperor's domain to assist an insurgency against His servants? Heresy!"

traits.locale_text: 「それとも、ヴラダイムに引き続き支配されている方が、フットフォールにとっては良かったとでも言うのか？あいつは人類の敵と交わり、彼らの創造物に手を出した。結果、彼の名誉は汚された。今は魂の腐敗が、更に進んでいる。異種族を皇帝の領地に連れ込み、皇帝の召使に対する反乱に参加させている。異端なんだよ！」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: «¿O habría sido mejor que Paso siguiera gobernado por Vladaym? El señor mancilló su nombre hace mucho tiempo al mezclarse con enemigos de la Humanidad y participar en sus creaciones. Ahora no ha hecho más que profundizar la corrupción de su alma. ¿Traer deliberadamente xenos a los dominios del Emperador para ayudar a su insurgencia contra Sus siervos? ¡Herejía!».
languages.original_text: "Or would it have been better for Footfall to still be ruled by Vladaym? The Liege tainted his name long ago by mingling with enemies of Humanity and dabbling in their creations. Now he has but deepened the corruption in his soul. Wilfully bringing xenos into the Emperor's domain to assist an insurgency against His servants? Heresy!"

traits.locale_text: «¿O habría sido mejor que Paso siguiera gobernado por Vladaym? El señor mancilló su nombre hace mucho tiempo al mezclarse con enemigos de la Humanidad y participar en sus creaciones. Ahora no ha hecho más que profundizar la corrupción de su alma. ¿Traer deliberadamente xenos a los dominios del Emperador para ayudar a su insurgencia contra Sus siervos? ¡Herejía!».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Oder wäre es besser gewesen, wenn Vladaym noch über Footfall herrscht? Der Lehnsherr hat seinen Namen vor langer Zeit vergiftet, indem er sich mit Feinden der Menschheit verbunden und mit ihren Schöpfungen herumgespielt hat. Nun hat er die Verderbnis in seiner Ziele nur noch vertieft. Wissentlich und willentlich Xenos in das Reich des Imperators zu bringen, die ihm bei einem Aufstand gegen dessen Diener helfen? Ketzerei!"
languages.original_text: "Or would it have been better for Footfall to still be ruled by Vladaym? The Liege tainted his name long ago by mingling with enemies of Humanity and dabbling in their creations. Now he has but deepened the corruption in his soul. Wilfully bringing xenos into the Emperor's domain to assist an insurgency against His servants? Heresy!"

traits.locale_text: "Oder wäre es besser gewesen, wenn Vladaym noch über Footfall herrscht? Der Lehnsherr hat seinen Namen vor langer Zeit vergiftet, indem er sich mit Feinden der Menschheit verbunden und mit ihren Schöpfungen herumgespielt hat. Nun hat er die Verderbnis in seiner Ziele nur noch vertieft. Wissentlich und willentlich Xenos in das Reich des Imperators zu bringen, die ihm bei einem Aufstand gegen dessen Diener helfen? Ketzerei!"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: « Ou que Castel se porterait mieux si Vladaym tenait toujours les rênes ? Le suzerain s'était déjà couvert de honte il y a bien longtemps en pactisant avec les ennemis de l'humanité et en jouant avec leurs créations, mais aujourd'hui, la corruption de son âme est au-delà de toute rédemption. Faire venir des xénos dans le domaine de l'Empereur pour fomenter une rébellion contre Ses serviteurs est pire qu'une hérésie ! »
languages.original_text: "Or would it have been better for Footfall to still be ruled by Vladaym? The Liege tainted his name long ago by mingling with enemies of Humanity and dabbling in their creations. Now he has but deepened the corruption in his soul. Wilfully bringing xenos into the Emperor's domain to assist an insurgency against His servants? Heresy!"

traits.locale_text: « Ou que Castel se porterait mieux si Vladaym tenait toujours les rênes ? Le suzerain s'était déjà couvert de honte il y a bien longtemps en pactisant avec les ennemis de l'humanité et en jouant avec leurs créations, mais aujourd'hui, la corruption de son âme est au-delà de toute rédemption. Faire venir des xénos dans le domaine de l'Empereur pour fomenter une rébellion contre Ses serviteurs est pire qu'une hérésie ! »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Yoksa Binliman'ın başında hâlâ Vladaym'ın olmasını mı tercih ederdin? İnsanlığın düşmanlarıyla ve onların yaratımlarıyla haşır neşir olan Emîr'in ismi, çok uzun zaman önce kirlenmişti. Son zamanlarında ruhundaki yozlaşmışlığı derinleştirmekten başka bir şey yapmadı. İmparator'un diyarına, O'nun hizmetkârlarına karşı isyanı desteklemeleri için bile isteye zeno getirmek... Külliyen kâfirlik!"
languages.original_text: "Or would it have been better for Footfall to still be ruled by Vladaym? The Liege tainted his name long ago by mingling with enemies of Humanity and dabbling in their creations. Now he has but deepened the corruption in his soul. Wilfully bringing xenos into the Emperor's domain to assist an insurgency against His servants? Heresy!"

traits.locale_text: "Veya Binliman'ın hâlâ Vladaym tarafından yönetiliyor olmasını mı tercih ederdin? İnsanlığın düşmanlarıyla ve onların yaratımlarıyla haşır neşir olan Emîr'in ismi çok uzun zaman önce kirlenmişti. Son zamanlarında ruhundaki yozlaşmışlığı derinleştirmekten başka bir şey yapmadı. İmparator'un diyarına, O'nun hizmetkârlarına karşı olan bir isyanı desteklemeleri için, bile isteye zeno getirmek mi? Kâfirlik!"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04
